name: Tomb of Horus
description:
There are overall 16 levels in this game, players need to complete each level to unlock the next ones

and each level has a specified timer and chance limit , there are 4 types of connectors which comes in different shapes

these connectors are rotatable in their own respective shapes

Players have to use these connectors and rotate them and make their path to the other end

the "ends" represented as "ANKH" (Egyptian symbol)

After completing each level player is rewarded with stars form 1 to 3 , 

based on their usage of 'time' and 'Chances' 3 being the highest
